title: An Enhanced Mask R-CNN Approach for Pulmonary Embolism Detection and Segmentation
details: K Doğan, T Selçuk, A Alkan - Diagnostics, 2024
abstract: Pulmonary embolism (PE) refers to the occlusion of pulmonary arteries by blood clots, posing a mortality risk of approximately 30%. The detection of pulmonary embolism within segmental arteries presents greater challenges compared with …
